text: Willoughby is a city in Lake County, Ohio, United States and is a suburb of Cleveland.Taddeo, Ronald J. "How Willoughby REALLY Got Its Name". City of Willoughby website. The population was 23,959 at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== * Willoughby, Ohio * Willoughby Area Welcome Center * Willoughby branch of the Willoughby-Eastlake Public Library Category:Cities in Ohio
title: Willoughby, Ohio
